detail_type.description: The level of detail to include in the notifications for this resource. Possible values are `BASIC` and `FULL`.

event_type_ids.description: A list of event types associated with this notification rule.

resource.description: The ARN of the resource to associate with the notification rule.

status.description: The status of the notification rule. Possible values are `ENABLED` and `DISABLED`, default is `ENABLED`.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

target.description: Configuration blocks containing notification target information. Can be specified multiple times. At least one target must be specified on creation.

address.description: The ARN of notification rule target. For example, a SNS Topic ARN.

type.description: The type of the notification target. Default value is `SNS`.
